member.name: M:Tekla.BIM.Toolkit.Extensions.Near(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified values are near to each other.
member.param: The allowed error in units in the last place (ULP). The default value is 10.
member.returns: True if the specified values are near to each other, otherwise false.
member.remarks: Floating point comparison is very tricky as the precision of the values varies depending on the magnitude. To handle this, the values are linearized into discrete units that can be compared directly.
